Title: Gaming
All Day Event: 'Cash N' Guns Live is a LARPing game where everyone is a gangster. Eight to 20 players play in a public place where non-players are present. When the referee blows the whistle- all players point their hands (as if they had a gun) towards another player. Or maybe you want to throw a grenade? Team based play is required with a maximum of 20 participants per game. Rules: http://goo.gl/ZNPElW'

Title: Gaming
All Day Event: 'What happens when you are out at a restaurant- or waiting in line for a movie- and you've forgotten to bring a game to stave off boredom? This panel will teach you several games you can play with any number of people that require only a pen and paper- a few coins- or nothing at all. Puzzle games- word games- party games- strategic games- dexterity games... all can be played if you just know the rules! You'll instantly feel like you can handle any airline delay or family function without your miniatures- cards- or boards.'
